name: Karachi
description: Karachi, the largest city of Pakistan, is known for its coastline, vibrant markets, diverse culture, and historical landmarks.

name: Lahore
description: Lahore is the cultural capital of Pakistan, famous for its Mughal architecture, food streets, gardens, and historical monuments.

name: Islamabad
description: Islamabad, the capital city of Pakistan, is known for its planned layout, greenery, mountains, and iconic landmarks.
